dateParserServiceProvider

  1. - dateParserService
  2. - provider in module

Provider for kpDateParser directive providing default settings.

Methods

  • clearDateFormatsPipeline();

    Clear parsing pipeline.

  • setFormatsPipelineToDefault();

    Roll back parsing pipes to default values

  • pushNewFormatToPipeline(format);

    Add new format to parsing pipeline

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    format String

    New format to push

  • setViewDefaultFormat(format);

    Set default view format

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    format String

    New default view format
